data.convo: Waiter , bring me the menu , will you ? Just a moment , I'm coming . ( ten minutes later ) . Now , what would you like ? I'd like to see the menu . Would you get me one , please ? Yes , certainly . Here you are . Thank you . Ah ! But this is in French . Would you mind giving me the English menu ? It's written in English too , in smaller print . There . Thanks . I'll need a while to choose . Could you come back in a minute ? Right . ( five minutes later ) Now , what are you having ? I'm sorry , I haven't decided yet . Do you mind giving me a couple of minutes ? All right , but would you be so kind as to make up your mind soon ? We're very busy just now as you can see , sir .
